title: Integrated Experimental Projects for Developing Science Gifted Potential

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and experimental design capabilities
context.additional_context: Experimental Data Analysis Using Digital Devices and Collaboration Tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three characteristics of scientific giftedness (curiosity, creative problem-solving, intensive inquiry).
Learners can independently conduct a science experiment project linked to social issues at least once according to an integrated curriculum design.
Learners can quantitatively and qualitatively evaluate experimental results using digital tools (sensors, data analysis software) and write reports.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
